RTCIceCandidatePairStatsRequestsSent.summary:
The dictionary's
requestsSent property indicates the total number of
STUN connectivity check requests that have been sent so far on the
connection described by this pair of candidates.
RTCIceCandidatePairStatsRequestsSent.value:
An integer value which specifies the number of STUN connectivity requests that have
been sent to date on the connection described by this pair of ICE
candidates.
NOTENote: The reported number of requests does not include
retransmissions. If a request had to be repeated due to network issues, it will be
counted multiple times here. This differs from
, which
does include retransmissions.
